name: Bubble Journey
description:
A lite puzzle platformer where you consume collectable bubbles to maneuver.

Controls:

Option 1: Arrow Keys, Z, X

Option 2: Arrows Keys, SPACE, LEFT SHIFT

Options 3: There are gamepad bindings but they are fickle on WebGL. (D-Pad, West Button, South Button)

Level Skip: 

As I want everyone to be able to enjoy the full game for the jam, you may skip a level if it is too difficult by pressing the magic bubble key (the letter o).

Known Bugs: 

Web version may not load in Firefox. Chrome and Edge work fine.
